tool.name: mkyrobe predict
tool.command:
@select_inputs@
mykrobe predict '${name}' ${select_species.species}
#if $select_species.panel == 'custom': #if $adv.custom_probe: --custom_probe_set_path '${adv.custom_probe}' #end if #if $adv.custom_variant_to_resistance: --custom_variant_to_resistance_json '${adv.custom_variant_to_resistance}' #end if #elif $select_species.panel: --panel '${select_species.panel}' #end if
#if $kmer: --kmer '${kmer}' #end if
#if $min_variant_conf: --min_variant_conf '${min_variant_conf}' #end if
#if $conf_percent_cutoff: --conf_percent_cutoff '${conf_percent_cutoff}' #end if
#if $expected_depth: --expected_depth '${expected_depth}' #end if
#if $min_gene_conf: --min_gene_conf '${min_gene_conf}' #end if
#if $min_gene_percent_covg_threshold: --min_gene_percent_covg_threshold '${min_gene_percent_covg_threshold}' #end if
#if $min_depth: --min_depth '${min_depth}' #end if
#if $expected_error_rate: --expected_error_rate '${expected_error_rate}' #end if
$report_all_calls
$ont
#if $min_proportion_expected_depth: --min_proportion_expected_depth '${min_proportion_expected_depth}' #end if
$ignore_minor_calls
#if $ignore_filtered: --ignore_filtered '${ignore_filtered}' #end if
$guess_sequence_method
#if $model: --model '${model}' #end if
#if $ploidy: --ploidy '${ploidy}' #end if
-q -t "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}"
-1 #if $type == 'fastq': *.fastq #else *.bam #end if
--format '${format}'
> '$output'

param.name: custom_variant_to_resistance
param.label: Custom Variant to Resistance
param.help: JSON file with key,value pairs of variant names and induced drug resistance.

param.label: Expected error rate
param.help: Expected sequencing error rate. Set to 0.15 for ONT genotyping

param.label: Minimum genotype confidence for variant genotyping
Minimum genotype confidence for gene genotyping
Minimum gene predict coverage
param.help: all genes alleles found above this percent coverage will be reported (default 100 (only best alleles reported))

param.label: Minimum depth required on the sum of both alleles
Confidence percent cutoff
param.help: Number between 0 and 100. Determines --min_variant_conf, by simulating variants and choosing the cutoff that would keep x% of the variants. Default is 90 if --ont, otherwise --min_variant_conf is used as the cutoff

validator.message: Confidence percent cutoff should be between 0 and 100

param.label: Diploid or Haploid
param.help: Use a diploid (includes 0/1 calls) or haploid genotyping model

param.label: Guess sequence method
param.help: Guess if ONT or Illumia based on error rate. If error rate is > 10%, ploidy is set to haploid and a confidence threshold is used

param.label: Ignore minor calls
param.help: Ignore minor calls when running resistance prediction
